data.title: List of the world’s largest countries and dependencies by area | Area size, Landmass, Population
meta_keywords: list of the world’s largest countries and dependencies by area
data.meta_description: What’s the largest country by area? Find out in our list.
data.text:
list of the world’s largest countries and dependencies by area

There are nearly 200 countries in the world, but when it comes to which is the largest, there is no competition. With a total area of 6,592,850 square miles (17,075,400 square km), Russia is the world’s largest country. A distant second is Canada, with 3,855,103 square miles (9,984,670 square km). At the opposite end is Vatican City, which is the world’s smallest country. It covers just 0.17 square mile (0.44 square km). How do the other countries rank? Find out in our list, which provides the total area in square miles and square kilometers for all countries of the world and for all but the smallest political dependencies and territories. It is ordered by total area, from the largest to the smallest.

1 Includes inland water area of 85,631 square miles (221,783 square km) and Great Lakes water area of 60,093 square miles (155,640 square km); excludes coastal water area of 42,334 square miles (109,645 square km) and territorial water area of 76,804 square miles (198,921 square km).

2 Metropolitan France only; overseas departments and territories are excluded.

3 Excludes Western Sahara, an annexure of Morocco.

4 Includes Svalbard and Jan Mayen.

Get a Britannica Premium subscription and gain access to exclusive content. Subscribe Now

5 Includes river area of 3,180 square miles (8,236 square km).

6 Excludes the self-declared independent country of Kosovo.

7 Area of Georgia excluding Abkhazia and South Ossetia is 22,070 square miles (57,160 square km).

8 Excludes the West Bank and the Gaza Strip.

9 Data are for the island of Cyprus.

10 Excludes East Jerusalem.

11 Excludes Saint-Martin and Saint-Barthélemy.

12 Includes the 0.7 square mile (1.8 square km) area of the uninhabited islet of Klein Curaçao.
